New Records: New Zealand recorded the highest total at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium with 401 for six
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman's hurricane ton helped Pakistan stay in the hunt after DLS finish
Rain stopped play with 21.3 overs bowled
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was thrice interrupted by rain
Pakistan defeated New Zealand by 21 runs (DLS method)
Others: The M. Chinnaswamy Stadium has witnessed a high-scoring match with 402 runs for victory
